answers.text: You can replace upfront Capital Expenses (CAPEX) with variable Operational Expenses (OPEX).
You can replace fluctuating Operational Expenses (OPEX) with upfront Capital Expenses (CAPEX).
You have to pay both upfront and variable CAPEX and OPEX costs.
You no longer have to consider CAPEX nor OPEX expenses when using AWS.
